metadata.name: Risshun Daikichi PASS
metadata.description:
Risshun is the beginning of spring and the start of the year based on the movement of the sun. 
2023 is the year of the rabbit (卯), the year of domestic safety and leap forward. 
This is the beginning of the end and the beginning of an important year for world peace, and will bring blessings to those who hold this certificate. 
In Japan, the ancient philosophy of "Hakko Ichiu" （八紘一宇）has been spoken of and handed down from generation to generation. Please share this Samurai Spirit.
